result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. LaRon M Land

records.addlTxt: Motion hearing on November 17, 2022 at 03:15 pm.

Defendant LaRon M Land in court.  Attorney Ronald Gabriel Benavides in court for LaRon M Land.  Attorney Kyle Olsen in court for State of Wisconsin. Counsel advised they reached a resolution on cases that were to be tried first. CT picked jury in another defn's case prior to calling defn's case. Parties left without formally being excused. CT prepared to pick two juries and/or resolve case with a PLEAS. CT w/h issuing BW. CT sets 21CF314/19CM2165 for a PLEAS and sets defn's other cases for a motion hearing on the State's joinder motion.
Motion hearing scheduled for November 17, 2022 at 03:15 pm.

Defendant LaRon M Land in court, in custody.  Attorney Ronald Gabriel Benavides in court for LaRon M Land.  Attorney Kyle Olsen in court for State of Wisconsin. Parties have not reached an agreement. CT leaves on for trial. Counsel agree 19CM2165/21CF314 to be tried first.
Jury status hearing on October 5, 2022 at 09:30 am.

Defendant in court with Attorney Ronald Gabriel Benavides.  Kyle Olsen appeared for the State of Wisconsin. CT to set for trial. Counsel agree 19CM2165 or 21CF314 to be tried first.  Jury status hearing scheduled for October 5, 2022 at 09:30 am.  Jury selection scheduled for October 17, 2022 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for October 19, 2022 at 08:30 am.
from ADA Olsen regarding offer
Pre-trial conference on July 22, 2022 at 08:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for LaRon M Land
Current: 1819 Aberg Ave, Madison, WI 53704 United States  (Effective: 06-07-2022)
Prior: 1819 Aberg Ave., Madison, WI 53704 United States

Defendant in court with Attorney Ronald Gabriel Benavides.  Kyle Olsen appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defn rec'd global offer; argument by Atty Benavides. Defn waiting on a piece of digital discovery. Defn request a new atty be appointed; Atty Benavides moves to withdraw verbally. Argument by ADA Olsen; State submitted follow up request. Colloquy w/ defn; Statement by Defn. Defn no longer wishes Atty Benavides w/d. Defn advised of rights and right to an atty. CT takes no action on oral motion. CT to set another PTC. Parties to be prepared to set for trial at the next hearing if not prepared to resolve. Bail cont.
and notice of DNA and witness list - State's
Pre-trial conference on June 6, 2022 at 02:45 pm.

Information was e-filed with the court and a copy was given to the defendant; Defn waived reading of Information; Counsel enters a plea of not guilty on behalf of Defendant; motions due within 20 days; bail continued
